channel.title: bauyeung on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)
channel.description: Recent content in bauyeung on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)

item.description: Dr Auyeung is Reader and Chancellorâ€™s Fellow at the University of Edinburgh where her work is focused around two central themes: 1) the role of prenatal factors on psychological and neural postnatal development and 2) interventions to alleviate the symptoms of developmental difficulties. Prior to her current role, Dr Auyeung worked at the Autism Research Centre at the University of Cambridge where she remains Director of Psychoneuroendocrinology. Before joining Cambridge, Dr Auyeung was a graduate researcher at the University of California (Los Angeles).
